column.name: SERVICE_CODE
column.comment: User Defined Unique Identifier of this object

column.name: SERVICE_VERSION_CODE
column.comment: User Defined Unique Identifier of the Service Version

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: The date on which the product version becomes effective and is

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: The type of change allowed for this type of payment. Valid for POS payments only.

column.name: LOADTM
column.comment: data warehouse entry change date timestamp (Original name in the DWHDB "_LOADTM")

column.name: EFFECTIVE_STATUS
column.comment: An indication of this Product Versions usable position

column.name: SERVICE_PROFILE_CODE
column.comment: Foreign key pointing to the Unique Identifier of the Service Profile of this Service is based on

column.name: SERVICE_LEVEL_ID
column.comment: Foreign key pointing to the Unique Identifier of the Service Level associated with this Service.

column.name: PROVIDER_CODE
column.comment: Foreign key pointing to the Unique Identifier of the Provider of this Service

column.name: NAME
column.comment: !!! BITTE NACHPFLEGEN !!! - Hier: Inhalt der Aktion.

column.name: CLASSIFICATION_VALUE
column.comment: A reference data key for the definition of the category of the service.

column.name: TAX_CODE
column.comment: A reference data key for the type of tax code associated to this Service.

column.name: ACCESS_INDICATOR
column.comment: Specifies whether or not this is a base network access Service.

column.name: PROVISIONED_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicates whether or not a Service is to be provisioned on the provider`s network

column.name: TECHNICAL_SERVICE_VALUE
column.comment: A reference data key for the mapping from a Raw Event to a Service.

column.name: DESCRIPTIVE_TEXT
column.comment: A narration of this Pricing Structures attributes

column.name: MIN_TIME_OF_PROVISION
column.comment: Minimum time of Provision of a Service

column.name: RESPONSIBLE_MANAGER
column.comment: The name of an entity of the system with responsibility

column.name: BILLING_NAME_1
column.comment: alternative internationalization of billing name (in english)

column.name: BILLING_NAME_2
column.comment: alternative internationalization of billing name (in german)

column.name: COMMENT_ID
column.comment: Foreign key pointing to Unique Identifier of a comment on this object.

column.name: PLANNED_RELEASE_DATE
column.comment: The expected date of the Services release

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_USER_ID
column.comment: Audit information capturing user id of last update

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: Audit information capturing date and time of last update

column.name: UPDATE_NUMBER
column.comment: Version number of the row. The version number starts with a random number and is incremented on each update. Update and Delete operations verify that the number in the database is equal to the number used in the SQL statement (optimistic locking).

column.name: DISCONTINUE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: The date at which the Service was discontinued. Note that this does not allow future dated discontinues. This field is purely for audit purposes only. As soon as the DISCONTINUE_INDICATOR is set to true, the Service is considered discontinued.

column.name: DISCONTINUE_INDICATOR
column.comment: If true, indicates that the Service has been discontinued, and is no longer available for subscription for new customers. The Service is still valid, however, and may be used by existing customers.

column.name: EFFECTIVE_FLAG
column.comment: Flagging of entries according to EFFECTIVE_DATE maintained by source system (EFFONL). "N" (now) - currently valid entry, "P" (past) - entry that was valid some then in the past, "F" (future) - entity will be valid in the future.

column.name: PHON_NAME
column.comment: Phone Number

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE_HW
column.comment: Effective Date

column.name: SERVICE_INDICATOR
column.comment: indicates leitungrelevant or nicht-leitungsrelevant service

column.name: SERVICE_TYPE
column.comment: Typisierung des Service nach Preisplan, SOC, Promotional SOC etc. G ltige Werte sind: P - Price Plan, M - Reduced Price Plan, R - Regular SOC, S - Reduced SOC, O - Optional SOC, B - Buy-One-Get-One SOC, T - Toll RS, L - Toll SOC for RC.

column.name: ALT_BILLING_NAME_1
column.comment: Alternate Billing Name #1

column.name: ALT_BILLING_NAME_2
column.comment: Alternate Billing Name #2

column.name: COUNTING_SERVICE_IND
column.comment: Service counting Indicator

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: N/A
